text:
Just a data point here that at least one install was successful (other PC’s were
not – but all others were 64 bit W10 installs) 
W10 32 bit successful… 
[cid:image001.png@01DA43E9.79B99F60] 
Basic disk with added partition after the Recovery partition… 
[cid:image002.png@01DA43E9.79B99F60] 
No idea of real partition space used for the Recovery Partition 
Cal
%40MCLTECH-SBS.mcltech.local

metadata.subject: RE: [patchmanagement] You may hit a 0x80070643 - ERROR_INSTALL_FAILURE
metadata.email_text_original:

[https://aka.ms/LearnAboutSenderIdentification]
